text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet loinc-survey-codes

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where CLASSTYPE = Clinical class
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where CLASSTYPE = Surveys
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where CLASS = LP62408-7 (PANEL.NEONAT)

name: LOINCSurveyCode
